tracePublicationMessage

public String tracePublicationMessage(String brokerID,
                                      String strPublication)
                               throws ClientException
Subscribes to broker messages that indicate they have received the publication messsage. Then tells the specified broker to advertise and then publish the specified publicatin message. After the broker publishes the message, the broker unadvertises

Parameters:
brokerID - the broker that is going to publish the message
strSubsciption - The actual string for the publication message
Returns:
subscribtion Id of the trace route message
Throws:
ClientException

                               throws ClientException
Throws:
ClientException

traceSubscriptionMessage

public String traceSubscriptionMessage(String brokerID,
                                       String strSubscription)
                                throws ClientException
Subscribes to broker messages that indicate they have received the publication messsage. Then tells the specified broker to subscribe the specified subscription message.

Parameters:
brokerID - the broker that is going to subscribe the message
strSubsciption - The actual string for the subscription message
Returns:
subscribtion Id of the trace route message
Throws:
ClientException
